name: Unichest
title: Unichest and Unipipe
author: zysnarch
description: Chests and pipes with globally linked contents, by item/fluid type. Set the filter in the GUI and the contents will be shared among all other unichests/unipipes with the same filter. Includes convenience tools to set the filter based on connected assemblers/miners/furnaces/etc (either by shift-click paste or provided selection tool).
